title: How can I change my Name from this stupid number.
body: As the title states, I log in after not playing for a few years and I see my name is: "IS1df4703416089b521242f" I certainly didn't set this name up so your team or a hacker must have done it.

replies.body: Heya, I can help!  Sometimes a name will change like this from inactivity, but you should have received a flag for a rename.  I've flagged your account, so you can change it the next time you login.
